author: David Ignatius
title: How did covid-19 begin? Its initial origin story is shaky.
description: The U.S. and China need to find the answer together.
content: U.S. intelligence officials dont think the pandemic was caused by deliberate wrongdoing. The outbreak that has now swept the world instead began with a simpler story, albeit one with tragic consequences: The prime suspect is natural transmission from bats to … [+5387 chars]
